item.title: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for CGEA ukulele. Keys of F and A.
Chords Used: F, Dm, Gm, C7, F7, Bb, Bbm,, C+, A, F#m, Bm, E7, G, Eb, C#7, Bdim7, Dm7
Original performance by George Harrison
[Corrected Version from the Original Upload]
Our local ukulele group is working on this song, and I was asked to check out the chords they are using (and the tablature they are using), and I made a play along video (there is no tablature in this song).
Do you enjoy these videos? If so, please click on the tutorial video and subscribe to the sister channel to this channel. This channel will feature only video play alongs, and the sister channel will feature all of my original content.
Tutorial Video (History, GCEA chords, & strumming) on the sister channel (please subscribe!): https://youtu.be/8bll9-iQLW8
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The baritone ukulele chord font is from ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from motionbolt.com
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!

item.title: Magalovania Undertale Ukulele Play Along--Slow Version
item.description: For Educational Use. The tempo of this song is slower than the original. Please look for a ukulele play along with a video to the original tempo. G, B flat, D flat, C, F flat, Dm, and F.

item.title: The Doobie Brothers - Listen to the Music
item.description: Chords: F, B-flat, Dm, G, C, E-flat Possible Strum Patterns: #1 = Two down strums on each big chord picture and one down strum on each little chord pictures. #2 = Four down strums on each big chord picture and two down strum on each little chord pictures. #3 = Syncopated strum within the video (listen closely for it...has a triplet feel)

item.title: Wiz Khalifa - See You Again - Universal Pictures Film Music
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play See You Again on the ukulele by Wiz Khalifa and Charlie Puth. The chords used are Bb Eb F Cm Gm. In the Key of C https://youtu.be/uQ-EltSVFe4.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos

item.title: Bill Withers - Lovely Day
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Lovely Day on the ukulele by Bill Withers. The chords used are F Dm7 Bbmaj7 Bbm7 Cm7 Eb C#maj7(Dbmaj7)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Anne Janelle - Angels We Have Heard on High
item.description:
For educational use. A new melody to the traditional Christmas Carol (and a new verse). Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of B-flat. Think it is an unfriendly key? I also transposed the song to C, making it far easier to play (https://youtu.be/gxAvBJza7iM).
As performed by Anne Janelle with James Hill. Anne Janelle is a singer and cello player, and is married to ukulele virtuoso and ukulele educator James Hill. Anne released this song this week--and released a handwritten chart of the chords of the song today, inviting people to play along. As it is Christmas Day, this will be the last Christmas/holiday play along that I create in 2018.
If you are new to the channel and/or ukulele, you can find all kinds of play along videos like these, which allow you to play along with the music you already know and love--sometimes modified to be in more ukulele friendly keys. There are also a number of great ukulele instructors on YouTube, including Cynthia Lin, Kate DeNure (One Music School), John Atkins (The Ukulele Teacher), Mike Lynch (who passed away in January of 2018, but his many videos are still out there to learn from), Stu Fuchs, Aldrine Guerrero (Ukulele Underground) and more.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: On The Beach at Waikiki Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
As performed by Julia Nui's Kama'ainas.
Why would I make this play along? It turns out this song was written for the Pan Pacific Exhibition in 1915, and this song created the first ukulele craze on the mainland of the United States (and ultimatley the rest of the world). While there are certainly other historical influences (good and bad) on the ukulele, the instrument would never have taken off as it did without the popularity of this song—and In a round about way, we wouldn’t know about the ukulele today without this song, either. No, this isn’t in the Top 40 today, but in terms of the Top 40 ukulele songs of all time, this is in the Top 5.
Be ready to play the E-Flat chord.
Background and lyrics taken from the original sheet music for the song: http://digital.library.msstate.edu/utils/getdownloaditem/collection/SheetMusic/id/8571/filename/8572.pdf/mapsto/pdf
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Natasha Bedingfield - Unwritten
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Unwritten on the ukulele by Natasha Bedingfield. The chords used are G F C Eb Em Am. (Original in F)
*Tips - Some might find it easier to play a Cm instead of the Eb. Also Em7 instead of the Em might be easier in some spots where the chord changes are faster.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
